languages.text: "В чем нельзя было отказать Теодоре, так в чутье — она десятилетия охотилась за ключом, способным открыть пространственные врата, будто чуяла, что за ними отыщет нечто стоящее. Ее Светлости посчастливилось найти Осколок в своей экспедиции. Трофей, который был ей явно не по зубам. Архимагос Амарнат изучал его для Теодоры, делал оружие в обмен на доступ к опасной реликвии. Впрочем, их изыскания были довольно примитивными и неамбициозными на фоне истинной мощи, заключенной в Осколке".

"Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."
languages.original_text: "В чем нельзя было отказать Теодоре, так в чутье — она десятилетия охотилась за ключом, способным открыть пространственные врата, будто чуяла, что за ними отыщет нечто стоящее. Ее Светлости посчастливилось найти Осколок в своей экспедиции. Трофей, который был ей явно не по зубам. Архимагос Амарнат изучал его для Теодоры, делал оружие в обмен на доступ к опасной реликвии. Впрочем, их изыскания были довольно примитивными и неамбициозными на фоне истинной мощи, заключенной в Осколке".

traits.locale_text: "Her Ladyship was lucky to discover a Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too tough for her. The Archmagos Amarnat had studied it on behalf of Theodora, creating weapons in exchange for the access to the dangerous relic. Their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Théodora avait un instinct hors du commun. Elle a passé des décennies à chercher une clé permettant d'ouvrir le portail dimensionnel, comme si elle savait qu'une découverte extraordinaire l'attendait de l'autre côté. Sa seigneurie a eu la chance de mettre la main sur l'Écharde durant l'une de ses expéditions. C'était un trophée qui la dépassait. L'archimagos Amarnat l'a donc étudié pour son compte et lui a créé des armes en contrepartie de l'accès à la dangereuse relique. Leurs recherches étaient trop primitives, cependant ; elles manquaient d'ambition comparées à la véritable puissance contenue dans l'Écharde. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."

traits.locale_text: « Sa seigneurie a eu la chance de découvrir l'Écharde durant l'une de ses expéditions. C'était un trophée qui la dépassait. L'archimagos Amarnat l'a donc étudié pour son compte et lui a créé des armes en contrepartie de l'accès à la dangereuse relique. Leurs recherches étaient trop primitives, cependant ; elles manquaient d'ambition comparées à la véritable puissance contenue dans l'Écharde. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Los instintos de Theodora eran espeluznantes. Se pasó décadas buscando una llave capaz de abrir el portal dimensional, como si supiera que había algo inimaginable esperándola al otro lado. Milady tuvo la suerte de descubrir el fragmento en una de sus expediciones, pero era un trofeo muy difícil de manejar para ella. El Archimagos Amarnat lo estudió con su beneplácito y fabricó armas a cambio del acceso a la reliquia, pero su investigación fue demasiado primitiva y poco ambiciosa para el auténtico poder que contenía».
languages.original_text: "Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."

traits.locale_text: «Milady tuvo la buena fortuna de dar con el fragmento durante una de sus expediciones. Era un trofeo demasiado complejo para ella. El Archimagos Amarnat lo estudió para beneficio de Theodora, creando armas a cambio del acceso a la inestable reliquia. Sin embargo, su investigación fue demasiado primitiva y simple para el auténtico poder que contenía».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “西奥多拉拥有不可思议的直觉。她花了几十年的时间，一直在寻找打开次元门的钥匙，好像她从一开始就知道，次元门的另一边有不可思议的战利品在等待着她。她很幸运，在某次探索中发现了那块碎片，但她无法掌握碎片真正的力量。在西奥多拉的授意下，阿玛纳特大贤者对那块碎片进行了研究，创造出了新的武器，以此换取进入遗迹的机会。然而，与碎片真正的力量相比，他们的研究还是太原始了，太缺乏野心。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人很幸运，在某次探索中发现了一块碎片。她无法掌握那件战利品真正的力量。在西奥多拉的授意下，阿玛纳特大贤者对那块碎片进行了研究，在研究过程中创造出了许多新的武器。然而，与碎片真正的力量相比，他们的研究还是太原始了，太缺乏野心。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Theodoras Instinkte waren schon fast unheimlich. Sie hat jahrzehntelang nach einem Schlüssel gesucht, mit dem sich das Dimensionstor öffnen lässt, als wüsste sie, dass auf der anderen Seite etwas Unglaubliches auf sie wartet. Ihre Ladyschaft hatte das Glück, während einer dieser Expeditionen das Fragment zu finden. Eine Trophäe, die zu mächtig für sie war. Erzmagos Amarnat hat das Fragment an Theodoras Stelle studiert, hat im Tausch gegen Zugang zu dem gefährlichen Relikt Waffen erschaffen. Doch ihre Forschungen waren zu primitiv und zu wenig ehrgeizig, wenn man die wahre Macht kennt, die dem Fragment innewohnt."
languages.original_text: "Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre Ladyschaft hatte das Glück, auf einer ihrer Expeditionen das Fragment zu entdecken. Eine Trophäe, mit der sie nicht umgehen konnte. Der Erzmagos Amarnat hatte das Fragment für Theodora untersucht und im Tausch gegen Zugang zu dem gefährlichen Relikt Waffen erschaffen. Doch ihre Forschungen waren zu primitiv und zu wenig ehrgeizig, wenn man die wahre Macht kennt, die dem Fragment innewohnt."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「シオドーラの直感は驚くべきものだった。彼女は超次元の門を開く鍵を数十年も探し続けていた。まるで、向こう側には何か信じられないようなものが待っているとを知っていたかのように。そして幸運にも、彼女はある遠征のさなかにシャードを発見した。それは彼女の手には負えない戦利品だった。大賢人アマルナトはシオドーラに代わってこれを研究し、危険な遺物へのアクセスと引き換えに武器を作った。しかし、彼らの研究はシャードに秘められた真の力に比べれば、あまりにも原始的かつ野心的なものでしかなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラの直感は驚くべきものだった。彼女は超次元の門を開く鍵を数十年も探し続けていた。まるで、向こう側には何か信じられないようなものが待っているとを知っていたかのように。そして幸運にも、彼女はある遠征のさなかにシャードを発見した。それは彼女の手には負えない戦利品だった。大賢人アマルナトはシオドーラに代わってこれを研究し、危険な遺物へのアクセスと引き換えに武器を作った。しかし、彼らの研究はシャードに秘められた真の力に比べれば、あまりにも原始的かつ野心的なものでしかなかったのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Theodora'nın içgüdülerine akıl sır ermezdi. Uzun yıllar boyunca sanki diğer tarafta onu bekleyen harika bir şey olduğunu biliyormuş gibi boyutsal geçidin anahtarını aradı. Leydi Hazretleri, seferlerinden birinde Parça'yı bulma şansına erişti. Fakat bu ganimete sahip olmak ona ağır geldi. Theodora'nın yerine Başmagos Amarnat onu inceledi, tehlikeli yadigâra erişme karşılığında silahlar üretti. Fakat Parça'nın içindeki gerçek güçle karşılaştırıldığında araştırmaları çok ilkel ve hırstan yoksundu."
languages.original_text: "Theodora's instincts were uncanny. She spent decades hunting for a key that could open the dimensional gate, as if she knew that there was something incredible waiting for her on the other side. Her Ladyship was lucky enough to discover the Shard during one of her expeditions. A trophy that was too much for her to handle. Archmagos Amarnat studied it on Theodora's behalf, creating weapons in exchange for access to the dangerous relic. But their research was too primitive and unambitious compared to the true power contained inside the Shard."
